title: What is the process of creating a magical entity and its potential dangers according to this text?
first_phrase: This text describes the process of creating a magical entity that can be seen and interacted with by the magician. The entity is generated through a special phase of concentration and visualization, and once it becomes visible, it can be used as a powerful tool of the magician's will. However, the entity can also become independent and rebel against the magician, leading to tragic consequences. The author argues that such cases must be interpreted as the result of external forces that have taken possession of the entity, rather than a simple hallucination. This last part (200 tokens) emphasizes the difficulty of destroying the entity once it has been animated, which further supports the notion that this is not just a mental delusion.

last_phrase: In conclusion, creating a magical entity requires immense skill and caution as it can become a force of its own. The entity can resist its creator and even lead to tragic outcomes. However, with a deeper understanding of spirituality and identity, the magician can integrate with the entity and harness its power for their own use.
